wikipedia_page.main: Dominic Chapman (born  (1976-03-07) 7 March 1976) is an English former rugby union footballer who plays as a back three player. He won his solitary England cap against Australia during the 1998 Tour of Hell. He played for a rugby club team in Richmond.
